name: Kulak
description:
Kulak is a tabletop game of chance and politics in which players fight and negotiate over land. The game pits a wealthy Baron against a group of Proletarians, who must decide if they will stand together or betray one another for a chance at prosperity.

There are two files available. The first contains the current Kulak ruleset and card sheets, and the second contains an updated version of the original "Classic" ruleset (as featured at IndieCade 2013).

Designed by Darren Caulley, Andrew Chen, David Coss, Graham Parkes, Seori Sachs, Chelsea So, and Felicia Wong
